title: A Day Late and a Dollar Short
description: “Without question, this is McMillan’s best. A glorious novel....A moving tapestry of familial love and redemption.”— The Washington PostWith her hallmark exuberance and a cast of characters so sassy, resilient, and full of life that they breathe, dream, and shout right off the page, Terry McMillan has given us a tour-de-force novel of family, healing, and redemption. A Day Late and a Dollar Short takes us deep into the hearts, minds, and souls of America—and gives us six more friends we never want to leave.
author: Terry McMillan
